Uses of Interface
net.mtrop.doom.Wad

Packages that use Wad 
Package Description
net.mtrop.doom
Contains the base structural abstracts for this library.
net.mtrop.doom.util
Contains utility classes.

  • Uses of Wad in net.mtrop.doom

    Classes in net.mtrop.doom that implement Wad 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  WadBuffer
    An implementation of Wad where any and all WAD information is manipulated in memory.
    class  WadFile
    The class that reads WadFile information and provides random access to Wad files.
    class  WadMap
    This is just a basic mapping of WAD entries to a file.
    Methods in net.mtrop.doom with parameters of type Wad 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void Wad.addFrom​(Wad source, int startIndex, int maxLength)
    Takes entries and their data from another Wad and adds it to this one.
    default void Wad.addFrom​(Wad source, WadEntry... entries)
    Takes entries and their data from another Wad and adds it to this one.
    default void Wad.addFromAt​(int destIndex, Wad source, int startIndex, int maxLength)
    Takes entries and their data from another Wad and adds it to this one at a specific index.
    default void Wad.addFromAt​(int destIndex, Wad source, WadEntry... entries)
    Takes entries and their data from another Wad and adds it to this one at a specific index.
    void WadFile.addFromAt​(int destIndex, Wad source, WadEntry... entries)  
    static WadBuffer WadBuffer.extract​(Wad source, int startIndex, int maxLength)
    Creates a new WadBuffer from a subset of entries (and their data) from another Wad.
    static WadBuffer WadBuffer.extract​(Wad source, WadEntry... entries)
    Creates a new WadBuffer from a subset of entries (and their data) from another Wad.
    static WadFile WadFile.extract​(File targetFile, Wad source, int startIndex, int maxLength)
    Creates a new WadFile from a subset of entries (and their data) from another Wad.
    static WadFile WadFile.extract​(File targetFile, Wad source, WadEntry... entries)
    Creates a new WadFile from a subset of entries (and their data) from another Wad.

    static void WadUtils.cleanEntries​(Wad source, File destination)
    Creates a new WAD file by copying the contents of an existing WAD to another file, which discards all un-addressed data from the first.

    Creates a BSPTree from a starting map entry in a Wad.

    static String[] MapUtils.getAllMapHeaders​(Wad wad)
    Returns all of the entry names of every map in the wad.
    static int[] MapUtils.getAllMapIndices​(Wad wad)
    Returns all of the indices of every map in the wad.

    Finds all entries within a WAD entry namespace.

    Finds all entries within a WAD entry namespace.
    static WadEntry[] MapUtils.getMapEntries​(Wad wad, int startIndex)
    Returns the entries in a map, including the header.
    static WadEntry[] MapUtils.getMapEntries​(Wad wad, String header)
    Returns the entries in a map, including the header, if the map is found.
    static int MapUtils.getMapEntryCount​(Wad wad, int startIndex)
    Returns the amount of entries in a map, including the header.
    static int MapUtils.getMapEntryCount​(Wad wad, String headerName)
    Returns the amount of entries in a map, including the header.
